summary: It can take years to build a weapons system. While work is underway, DOD may provide billions of dollars in payments to some weapons contractors, which can help them with short-term expenses. DOD has recognized that this practice can help contractors avoid loans and may help reduce costs. DOD last comprehensively analyzed how its contract financing policies affect industry in 1985, officials acknowledged. The industry...
title: Contract Financing: DOD Should Comprehensively Assess How Its Policies Affect the Defense Industry
